#WelcomeMessage:
Welcome to Nortantis. To create or open a map,
use the {file} menu.
#MapDrawError:
Map failed to draw due to an error.
To retry, use {file} -> {refresh}.
#HighlightLakesTooltip: Highlight lakes to make them easier to see.
#HighlightRiversTooltip: Highlight rivers to make them easier to see.
#UpdateAvailableMessage: Version {version} is now available. You can download it at
#OldPropertiesFileConverted: {file} is an older format '.properties' file. When you save, it will be converted to the newer format, a '{extension}' file.
#KeyboardShortcutsMessage:
Keyboard shortcuts for navigating the map:
  • Zoom: Mouse wheel
  • Pan: Hold mouse middle button or CTRL and mouse left click, then drag

Each editor tool has a keyboard shortcut for switching to it. Hover over the tool's icon to see the shortcut.
#ErrorSettingLookAndFeel: Error while setting look and feel: {error}
#FolderCreationError: An error occurred while creating the folder: {error}
#InvalidArtPackEmpty: Invalid art pack. It's empty. It should have exactly one top-level folder, the name of which is the name of the art pack.
#InvalidArtPackMultipleFolders: Invalid art pack. It should have exactly one top-level folder, the name of which will be the name of the art pack. It has {count} top-level folders.
#InvalidArtPackName: The art pack name '{name}' is not allowed.
#OverwriteArtPackMessage: The art pack '{name}' already exists. Do you wish to overwrite it?
#MapDoesNotExist: The map '{path}' cannot be opened because it does not exist.
#CustomImagesFolderConvertedMessage: Your custom images folder has been automatically converted to the new structure.
#ErrorRestructuringCustomImages: Error while restructuring custom images folder for {path}: {error}
#SettingsModifiedSavePrompt: Settings have been modified. Save changes?
